title: PUBG Mobile Club Open 2019 announced with whopping Rs. 14 crore prize money: Here's how you can enter
content:
The Club Open event is a year-long event which has both pro and semi-pro teams which will then fight for the $2 million prize pool which is roughly Rs. 14 crores, the biggest in any PUBG Mobile event till date.
PUBG Mobile new Challenge gets Rs. 14 crore prize money PUBG Mobile

title: Balakot air strikes count revealed! 263 terrorists had assembled at JeM camp in Pak for training - EXCLUSIVE
content: New Delhi: Amid the ongoing war of words in India over the number of terrorists killed in Balakot air strikes carried out by the Indian Air Force on the biggest terror training camp of Jaish-e-Mohammed in Pakistan, Times Now has learned that a total of 263 terrorists had assembled at the facility

title: Terrorist Maulana Masood Azhar, head of Pakistan-backed Jaish-e-Mohammad, dead
content: Jaish-e-Mohammad Chief Maulana Masood Azhar is reportedly dead. Sources said that Azhar died on March 2 at a military hospital in Pakistan's Rawalpindi. Pakistan is yet to make any formal announcement in this regard but top intelligence sources claimed that Azhar died due to liver cancer. </

title: Defence Minister meets Wing Commander Abhinandan in New Delhi
content:
Raksha Mantri Nirmala Sitharaman on Saturday met Wing Commander Abhinandan at the Army Hospital in New Delhi.
 
The Defence Minister conveyed to him that the entire nation is proud of his courage and determination. She also enquired about his health and condition.
&nb

title: US seeks information on Pakistan's potential misuse of F-16s
content:
WASHINGTON: The US is seeking more information from Pakistan on the potential misuse of American-made F-16 fighter jets by it against India in violation of the end-user agreement, the State Department has said.

title: Pakistani F-16 Pilot Dies After His Own Countrymen Lynched Him On Suspicion Of Being An Indian
content: The Pakistani pilot whose F-16 was shot down by Wing Commander Abhinandan Varthman, has succumbed to his injuries inflicted by his own countrymen. It should be noted that the pilot of F-16 had ejected after getting hit in an aerial engagement and had managed to land safely in his own territory. H

title: Chance to be part of Indian Army for engineering graduates, Rs 51,600â€‹ to be paid as stipend
content:
The Indian Army has invited applications from unmarried men and women engineering graduates and also from widows of defence personnel for grant of Short Service Commission (SSC) in all arms/services. The course will commence in April 2019 at Officers Training Academy in Chennai. 
&nb

title: Friday's total lunar eclipse will be longest blood moon visible this century, until 2123
content:
The full moon will turn blood red on July 27 as the longest total lunar eclipse of the century takes place in the skies from Australia through Africa.
A total lunar eclipse occurs when the moon passes through the Earth’s innermost shadow. When this happens, the moon turns rusty oran
